data.thought: S11|H|S10|Reactive+Container Phenotype B1: 'On-Demand Dev Environment'. Notebook listens for 'help me debug X' events. Spins up container w/ codebase, installs deps, runs tests. Streams output to Observatory. Uses Thoughtbox to analyze failures, propose fixes. Observable: container lifecycle, test results, AI reasoning overlaid. User sees: problem → container spawn → analysis → suggested fix. Like Codespaces but reasoning-native.
